name: Carl Zeiss Image Data File
summary: Learn about .CZI files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: CZI files can be analyzed and visualized with Carl Zeiss' ZEN software. There is also a Java API called ZeissCZIReader that can be used for programmatically reading the contents of CZI files. ZeissCZIReader is part of Fiji, which is incorporated into the ImageJ image processing software.

description: A CZI file is a microscope image data file created in the Carl Zeiss CZI format. It contains image stacks, time-lapse series, and tile images captured from a Carl Zeiss microscope. CZI files are used for generating video sequences and performing medical research.
